issue.title: Add INSERT INTO SELECT support

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
Description of syntax can be found [here](http://www.w3schools.com/sql/sql_insert_into_select.asp).

Example (taken from [here](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/30068624/how-to-write-insert-query-in-yii2)):

``` sql
INSERT INTO Customers (CustomerName, Country)
SELECT SupplierName, Country FROM Suppliers;
```

Can't find it in core. `QueryBuilder`'s `insert` method returns concatenated string with `VALUES`:

``` php
return 'INSERT INTO ' . $schema->quoteTableName($table)
    . ' (' . implode(', ', $names) . ') VALUES ('
    . implode(', ', $placeholders) . ')';
```

body: Does MSSQL work with conditions in such case at all?

It does: https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms189872(v=sql.105).aspx
~~I suspect there's something with escaping.~~ I can take a look.
@JQueryBoy14 do you have unique placeholders in your query: http://stackoverflow.com/a/34158696?

if **placeholder** means **bind values/parameters**

i think i have a **unique** placeholder which is **:qp0**.

This was generated by AR

@JQueryBoy14 I see, thanks.

I confirm this. Works okay without preparing, fails with preparing. I look through it.

issue.title: Fixed yii\db\QueryBuilder to inherit ‘INSERT INTO ... SELECT’ SELECT’s params (fixes #13807)

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
| Q             | A
| ------------- | ---
| Is bugfix?    | yes
| New feature?  | no
| Breaks BC?    | yes
| Tests pass?   | yes
| Fixed issues  | #13807 

This PR fixes `QueryBuilder` did not account params in a subquery when building `INSERT INTO … SELECT` introduced in #9420. I didn’t mention a small BC break in `UPGRADE.md` yet.

body: I have opened #13843 to fix this.
